title: New Fox Rampage Pro Carbon lines up with MIPS for rotational impact protection
content:
Just in time for this coming weekendâ€™s 2021 DH World Championships in Val di Sole, Fox Racing have updated their top-level DH Racing helmet, the Fox Rampage Pro Carbon MIPS. Tahnee Seagrave, Loic Bruni, Laurie Greenland and all the other Fox Racing athletes will be relying on its lightweight carbon fibre shell, dual-density EPS and
